h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Tiger Vanguard
content: The other attack can come extremely quickly and unfortunately has a few variants. The most common one starts as the Tiger Vanguard approaches with a spin ending in a downward kick. As soon as he finishes his kick, he’ll seamlessly unsheathe his sword as he performs a downward swing to catch you off guard. This will be followed by a quick upward slash in the same direction, and then a large arcing spinning slash finale.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Tiger Vanguard'.
The content is as follows:
The other attack can come extremely quickly and unfortunately has a few variants. The most common one starts as the Tiger Vanguard approaches with a spin ending in a downward kick. As soon as he finishes his kick, he’ll seamlessly unsheathe his sword as he performs a downward swing to catch you off guard. This will be followed by a quick upward slash in the same direction, and then a large arcing spinning slash finale.
